title: MORE terrible news for Xiaomi
description:
Sponsored by Morning Brew. Sign up for free today: https://morningbrewdaily.com/fridaycheckout

 ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬  

►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Xiaomi got a second massive fine in India for potential tax evasion and transfer pricing, Google announced a ton of new gadgets like the Pixel 7, Pixel Buds Pro and Pixel Watch at Google I/O and the EU has a new CSAM proposal that might break end to end encryption for good.

Episode 96
